item.description:
Strawberry Fest

We've been asked to host a booth for the kids - so we're running the moonbounce and the pick-a-pop contest! Kids go crazy for it - lol. Money we raise goes to a charity of our choice! (TBA) Come help for the good cause, volunteers get a free strawberry shortcake on the Jaycees - so yum!

I need at least 5 helpers at all times but it's a long day so I tried to break it into shifts. If you can help the whole day - AWESOME - but if not please specify when you can come.

Shifts:
9:30 - 1:30
1:00 - 4:00
3:30 - 6:30

Thanks!
Jess
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Jaycees booth, by the moonbounce
item.name: Strawberry Fest Moonbounce Fundraiser
